name: Captain Collision
description:
A hostile fleet pursues you through an asteroid field. Your vessel is slow and unarmed. They don't stand a chance.

Click and drag asteroids to defend yourself and demolish your enemies. Outflank point-defense systems, intercept homing missiles, and overpower massive bosses as you fight through 5 sectors and restore peace to the galaxy!

FEATURES


-25 levels

-5 bosses

-5 bonus waves

-Original soundtrack
